remarks: Lemma for ~ ulmshft .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Mar-2015.)
statement:
ulmshft.z $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
ulmshft.w $e |- W = ( ZZ>= ` ( M + K ) ) $.
ulmshft.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
ulmshft.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. ZZ ) $.
ulmshft.f $e |- ( ph -> F : Z --> ( CC ^m S ) ) $.
ulmshft.h $e |- ( ph -> H = ( n e. W |-> ( F ` ( n - K ) ) ) ) $.
ulmshftlem $p |- ( ph -> ( F ( ~~>u ` S ) G -> H ( ~~>u ` S ) G ) ) $.
$d F n $.
$d K n $.
$d S n $.
$d W n $.
$d n ph $.
